attributes.action: Make alternatives for single use plastics cheaper than buying plastic packaging
attributes.background: Most people pick convenience over conscience and therefore making alternatives more accessible and more affordable than plastic would deter from buying plastic items. Offering alternatives such as reusable straws, wooden cutlery, bamboo based beauty products etc in supermarkets and restaurants etc.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for retailers. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249877
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259176
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234775
